website_summaries.verdict: You'll like the toughness and understated style of these Oakley sunglasses with polarized lenses.
pros: The frames on the Holbrook sunglasses provide a simple design that also looks amazing
20 different color and design options available in this style of sunglasses
Some designs have multiple sizes available, ensuring you'll be able to create a precise fit
All-plastic frame and lenses yield a lightweight feel
cons: Construction of the hinges may not stand up well over time

customer_reviews.title: Cool, subtle, high quality and don't pinch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a pair of these a couple years ago (red and black polarized) and he LOVED them! Unfortunately his car was stolen recently and the glasses were in them. He liked them so much that he bought the same pair again, this time in blue and they're still just as great as before. This is a nice departure from Oakley's usual look. These are very understated but cool and my husband has a wide head and is sensitive to sunglasses pinching his noggin. These don't pinch at all and he says they're super comfortable. I think they look great and they're is favorite sunglasses. Worth the price to get a really good pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kate MahoneyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THESE!!!! THEY ARE FAKE ...
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THESE!!!! THEY ARE FAKE! I lost my previous pair of Holbrooks I had it for years before I dropped it somewhere, so I was very eager to get a new pair. I was so excited my package came today and before I could even pull the pair out of the bag I already knew it was all wrong! It said made in China, had no markings of Oakley on it what's so ever and it was cheap plastic! I WAS PISSED!!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa cruz

customer_reviews.title: very nice lightweight sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses...very lightweight and they are definitely genuine oakleys...i like how they are putting the USA on the earpiece so you know you are not getting some China Rip off! When buying these sunglasses i would never buy from any seller other than Amazon because i simply do not trust other sellers because of past issues of not being "Authentic". This is a big deal to me cheap lenses give me enormous headaches and I drive alot in my line of work...these Polarized sunglasses take away most of the road glare and make a bright day very easy on your eyes...also I love the Holbrook style it fits my face well. 5 stars!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert landin curtis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order from Amazon, go to Oakley’s store
customer_reviews.text: My advice to anyone who reads this: go to an actual online Oakley’s store and buy a pair of glasses that way!!! Thought I order a pair of glossy black frame, green mirrored lensed glasses. But not only did I not get that, I got a pair of glasses that looked nothing like any of the pictures. The style and lenses are nothing alike, the lenses aren’t even green (which is the main reason I wanted the glasses). Luckily they’re still Oakley’s and fit nice on my face so I’ll keep them since I only paid $90 for them. To be honest, if my girlfriend didn’t like the glasses I would return them hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Seriously impressed by Prizm!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Oakley’s for years and was super excited to try the new Prizm lenses. I love the frame, lightweight, covers my eyes well, looks good, and not too tight. Some past models usually hurt behind my ears after awhile not these. Second, I was blown away by the Prizm lenses. While taking them off and on all the bright areas around me are darkened and colors seem to pop!! It’s pretty remarkable. I tried to show thru my phone camera what I mean. It’s so cool to see the asphalt darkened but the greens of grass still. I LOVE these!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, but no case included!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight sunglasses. But instead of a case, I got a sack. Seriously? You couldn’t spring for a real case?
customer_reviews.author: Shopper90230

customer_reviews.title: No bag or box thanks internet
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are great except they just came in a generic box with zero packing or the normal oakley box and polish cloth bag. The glasses were super dirty and had some scratches from sliding around in the otherwise empty box. I honestly thought they were used. I really just want my darn bag to keep them in. May return. Just to be clear the glasses are awesome. Everything else is aweful. This is why I go to brick and mortar stores.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: They are far from new. Total BS
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were delivered completely destroyed and scratched. How on earth were these allowed to leave the factory?!? Now I have to waste my time to return glasses that look like they were attacked by a Lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert De

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - Love the Purple Lenses
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Love the purple lenses to stand out from my groomsmen during our beach wedding on Lake Michigan. The Oakleys were a big hit as a gift to the men in our bridal party.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they are real Oakleys
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are the real deal. I received them and inspected them and am not entirely convinced these are real oakleys. I returned them and went to an Oakley store and bought a pair of Holbrook XL’s. The fit and finish of the ones from the brick and mortar store definitely have a better fit and finish to them.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Oakley Prism Polarized glasses are a great price, just make sure the pair you get is ‘new’.
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I received directly from the Oakley Amazon store front had lens scratches and we’re clearly used. I returned it and got a second pair that appear, hopefully, to be new. They are holding up great. Once you go Oakley prism polarized, you never go back!
customer_reviews.author: JMC311

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome oakleys. I really like the fitment, I have a larger head size and these are the absolute perfect fitment for me. I have to admit that I like these more than any other glasses I've owned. The material is a hard yet comfortable plastic that is smooth. The glasses have enough grip that they don't tend to slide of. They're very comfortable and have an aggressive look, I'll be buying a few spare sets.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after wearing for an hour
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these were knock offs but regardless, after wearing for the first hour i noticed that 2 of the accent rivets on front of sunglasses simply fell out. Don't waste your time and money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great Shades
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat hesitant to purchase these because of their hefty price tag but I am pleased to say that these shades have surpassed my expectations. The new prism lens is comparable in color and contrast to more expensive lenses made by Maui Jim and Rayban, but with significantly less weight. If you consider that those lenses start at around $300 these are a good deal. These will be my new everyday shades, great for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Real?
customer_reviews.text: These are fake. The look/feel like $10 sunglasses. Very cheap. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bree H.

customer_reviews.title: OO9102-D655
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews were calling this a scam so I was a bit hesitant to buy them off Amazon but they seem to be genuine Oakley Holbrook with PrizmTM lenses (SKU: OO9102-D655) . Nice looking sunglasses but unfortunately, they do not come with a hard shell carrying case. Overall good quality, nice polarized lenses, and cheaper than the competitors that I was considering.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: From box to face - my hubby popped them on immediately and said he loves them. Typical Oakley quality - polarized lenses are worth the upgrade cost- hopefully they’ll hold up to his active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not all the hype I was hoping for...
customer_reviews.text: Well, these are a good product and they are nice and fit over my prescription glasses with no problems whatsoever. However, I cannot tell much of a difference between these lenses and those you would buy at a gas station. I’m so glad these where a Christmas present for me instead of me paying for them out of my own pocket. All in all they’re very well made, but the quality at least to me in the tint of the lenses, is not much different than what you would get at a gas station.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Engle

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of Oakleys!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are awesome! I've never owned Oakley glasses before but for my first pair I'm happy with the fit, finish and glass quality. I went with Oakley glasses because I'm rough on my glasses and wanted something that was nice, but nice over $200. Clarity is fantastic and the fit on my fat head is perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill BTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great shades!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift for my brother that works at a boat rental place. They look fantastic on him and he can see things in the water much better than with his old shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prizm Technology is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Prizm is no joke. The quality of the Prizm lens is unmatched on the market. Frankly there are no other glasses that will match to these. The Frame is of great quality and is very durable. They can be tossed around and there are no scratches on anything. Great everyday glasses. The price is also much better than any other place could offer.
customer_reviews.author: sam_19

customer_reviews.title: Really great pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. The color is a bit darker blue than the pictures in my opinion but they look amazing. They are comfortable, and the Prizm lenses make everything pop with color. They were exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marois

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was really sceptical about ordering Oakley sunglasses online and for half the price we've seen them in store for.. they came in and we have no complaints. If they are fake, we can not tell at all. My husband kept commenting how nice the lenses were and how bright it made all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glasses
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and look awesome. Ive had every pair of glasses made from WileyX to Rudy Projects. Oakley has terrific glasses and you pay for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kottlowski

customer_reviews.title: Hope my bf looks as good in them as I do.
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift for my bf. Haven’t given them to him yet but they look hot on me! But my head is also bigger. I hope he likes them. He better🤣. Or I got some new Oakleys.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. In fact the only thing I don't like about them is the sun eventually goes down and I have to take them off
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Davis

customer_reviews.title: For a smaller sized head
customer_reviews.text: As someone with a large but not overly large head, these are far too small. Pinched my temples. Lenses were smaller than expected as well. Would probably be great for someone with a smaller head though. Good material and nice lenses, (I mean they are Oakley's) just too small for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these, added to my other 2 pairs. You could spend $10 on a crap pair but my experience with Oakley is a long lasting one. Every pair has lasted minimally 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Y

customer_reviews.title: Prizms are excellent
customer_reviews.text: Gifted these to my husband. He loves them. The Prizm lenses have excellent clarity and coloration. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap frames, great lenses
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are awesome quality but the frames are...cheap. When I put them on they feel flimsy and creak a lot. They feel like they are made of cheap, thin plastic.
customer_reviews.author: GhostPopcorn

customer_reviews.title: amazing. The shipping was late and the package was ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself, amazing. The shipping was late and the package was very damaged. I know there isn't much that can be done to prevent others handling, but I was absolutely shocked to open an Manila envelope to find the glasses halfway out of a very tattered box. Luckily the glasses were fine and were able to be given as a Father's Day gift. He loved them and would definitely rate a 5 and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap frame, but high quality lenses
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses look great and the lenses themselves are fantastic. The frame is plastic and feels very cheap. In hindsight. I should have gone with the metal-frame variant. Overall, I would rate then 3.5 / 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Robert McClelland

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I gave these a try after 10ish years of wearing Oakley Flak Jacket XLJ glasses, which i loved. These Holbrooks are AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Oakley Holbrook
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast good quality but not as described had to send back to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lustic

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Oakley sunglasses. These are amazing I love the lenses Edit:5/7/18 I recently had a mental breakdown and slammed these to the ground and bot are these things strong they came apart in the pieces that are replace able nothing broke or cracked there was some scuffs on the lens and that was it went in to my local specs eye-ware and they replace the lens with the same lens from oakley way cheaper then ordering new ones from Oakley them selves
customer_reviews.author: GalaxyBoi

customer_reviews.title: Great look and protection from the suns rays.
customer_reviews.text: The dark ink fade frame, with mirrored/polarized lenses, make these sunglasses stand out. Absolutely love them....as this is my 2nd pair. Lost the first pair tubing down the Guadalupe after having one too many beers. I'm striving to take better care with these.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher VanKleef

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasss
customer_reviews.text: I love this glasses. Sadly I lost because I wasn’t wearing leash
customer_reviews.author: gabriel pereira

customer_reviews.title: Good but Expensive Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. The PRIZM lenses work very well but gives everything a slightly reddish hue due to the dyes that are used to create them. The matte finish on these does make any oil from your skin fairly noticeable when up close but can easily be cleaned off with the included soft pouch. Deducted one star because I think these should be a bit cheaper (in the $160-$180 range).
customer_reviews.author: brm87

customer_reviews.title: Love these Oakley's.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried they'd be fake after reading the reviews. These are legit. I'm very happy I bought them. Just in time for vacation too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M Casuccio

customer_reviews.title: A Great Pair of Shades
customer_reviews.text: Direct replacement for the ones my puppy chewed up. Got to love these glasses classic style and your eyes will miss then when you don't have them!
customer_reviews.author: Oceanside D

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, horribly damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses I received were horribly scratched and damaged. I really love the Holbrook style so I’m going to order another, hopefully in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: smd1994

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses I’ve had in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. Love the purple color. A little bit of a throwback. I have an average to slightly big head and they fit fine. Get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglassed.  Love that they are polarized.
customer_reviews.text: These remind me of my oakleys from my youth, but they've been modernized. Oakley's polarized lenses are hard to beat. Reduces glare like a pro. I keep a pair in my car and a pair on my person.
customer_reviews.author: MusicFan01

customer_reviews.title: Best-fitting Oakleys I've bought.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice glasses. I think the Ink color looks spectacular, and as noted the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Buy gas station glasses not these
customer_reviews.text: 2 months 2 pair of oakleys both garbage already. Your product sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking authentic sunglasses. The lenses we're very dark and I like how much light they block.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve warn these about 5 times and the lenses keep popping out. Wouldn’t buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse T.

customer_reviews.title: Len's were great but the frame's, not so much
customer_reviews.text: The lenses were very high quality with good color enhancement as expected. but they don't conform to your face whatsoever. they would be great if I didnt have the sunlight peaking in from every side of the glasses but unfortunately that is the case. Unless you have a flat face I would not suggest buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Horrible delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product 100%. Best looking and comfortable shades I ever wore. However, I was not pleased with the delivery person chucking it over my fence when my front gate is always open. Especially for a $120 pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Nice but scratches too easily
customer_reviews.text: Nice but scratches too easily. Thought Oakleys are supposed to be stronger like years past...
customer_reviews.author: Brichmond

customer_reviews.title: They float
customer_reviews.text: These get extra props for their ability to float. A happy surprise after being blindsided by a wave while swimming in the ocean. They look great and fit great. The advertisement is misleading however, only certain lens/frame options are polarized.
customer_reviews.author: nick richards

customer_reviews.title: Do your research if you want polarized
customer_reviews.text: Had to unfortunately return due to not being polarized like advertised. Great price compared to the retailer, but not what was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. I already have the Square-Wire model and they're great. But I like this even more. More comfortable and feels lighter to me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aust

customer_reviews.title: All over great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and they came in one day and just as expected. Only thing is that they look white in this picture but they are actually more clear/see through. All over great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: I believe these were cracked since I bout them as I've only worn them once but just noticed these came with a crack and are likely to break in the near future. I bought these because I loved the color but 200 bucks down the drain...
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Soft Lenses
customer_reviews.text: Their lenses keep getting softer since they were bought buy Luxotica
customer_reviews.author: Log13070

customer_reviews.title: Durability is an issue
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses look nice while they last. They broke within 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as they say they are
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how i pictured except they were not as durable as They say i got bumped on the board walk with my shades hanging from shirt and they broke and i only had them for a week super upset at how easily they broke
customer_reviews.author: justin r.

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are pretty large not for a normal sized face
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are pretty large not for a normal sized face, not sure why so expensive. The Gascan type glasses work much better for most I think
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I had hoped for. Terrific lenses. Stylish but not overbearing. Might be a bit snug on the temples if you have a head that leans to the larger side.
customer_reviews.author: patientfriendlydentist

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit, prefer TwoFace
customer_reviews.text: Good Oakley sunglasses but prefer now the TwoFace for quality, fit and color options. Polarized is a must have for fishing
customer_reviews.author: cavaliersam

customer_reviews.title: Look fake
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and look really really REALLY fake, I sent them back right away, beware
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect otherwise. The mistake was all
customer_reviews.text: I thought I bought a matte pair. Didn't realize until I received them that they were not matte. Scuffs and marks really show. But they are Oakleys! Perfect otherwise. The mistake was all mine
customer_reviews.author: pete rhetts

customer_reviews.title: Astounding Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best sunglasses I've ever owned and received many compliments wearing them. Great on the boat, beach, and land. They block a lot of sun because they are polarized as well. Highly recommend these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Omega Guru 111

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice. Polarization isn't as great as i expected
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking glasses but the prizm polarize is pretty weak. I have seen reviews that said similar things but thought i would test it myself. I have the jupiter oakleys and they are far superior in the sun for slightly less of a price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are awesome. I was kind of hesitant about buying them ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are awesome. I was kind of hesitant about buying them l, afraid of them being fakes but they came with warranty papers and the numbers matched up in the Oakley website. The only thing is that the lenses are not as green as I hope, but hey the polorized on them is really good. I would definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Alex ray flake

customer_reviews.title: Pimp
customer_reviews.text: Pimp sunglasses. Wish you would get a case with them though
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Candio

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Guys great! I have fat face and looks good on me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, improve shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product, but the box was crushed and the lens had a small scratch. Point reduced for shipping. I just paid $150+, protect the product! Don’t send it in an envelope, use a box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great shades. I read some reviews saying fake. I was able to register mine at oakley. Always check reviews on company that is selling product
customer_reviews.author: chris cutler

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses will continue to buy Oakley's for sure they are heavier than the frogskins but very comfortable and they are polarized love them for fishing.
customer_reviews.author: trai shimmel

customer_reviews.title: Second pair of these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. Very lightweight and comfortable and fit my face perfectly. Only bought another pair because I dropped the first pair on the sidewalk and they landed lens down, of course.
customer_reviews.author: S. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, it was a gift and the recipient loved it
customer_reviews.author: JAVO-69

customer_reviews.title: Oakley's are the best
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Oakley's and I couldn't be happier with them. Sturdy construction and some really nice lens tint options. Definitely spend the extra money for the polarized model.
customer_reviews.author: Micah G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Oakley Optics
customer_reviews.text: I love my Sapphire Iridium snowboarding goggles, and these are a great everyday alternative. Same fantastic optics, but pop in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: JDK

customer_reviews.title: 100% Fake!!! Not even close!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fake stuff!!! This item is nowhere close to the original oakley, not even close..
customer_reviews.author: Jing M.

customer_reviews.title: These are the sickest pair of sunglasses i have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the sickest pair of sunglasses i have ever gotten. They fit my face perfectly and the polarized lens make such a difference. They will probably be a bit harder to keep from wearing down with use... especially the iridium lenses but i think it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Great price and great quality. Got these for my husband and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Product was not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses i ordered were not even close to being the same as the ones I received. I ordered a black pair and received a white pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mckinley decker

customer_reviews.title: No case
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are great the only thing is it clearly says it comes with a case when I got the glasses that's all that came was glasses no case would have gave 5 stars if the case came too
customer_reviews.author: David bullock

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the eyes in more ways than one!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, love them, love them. No really, I love them. They are comfortable and the polarized lenses make such a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these, great comfort, never move on your face. I look like a movie star everything time.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this seller
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, the product is exactly what I wanted and original!! Recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Elmer G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, great look. The lenses are a bit tough to keep clean, but that's because I usually leave them in my car in a cup holder (vs in the case as they deserve).
customer_reviews.author: Jerome P.

customer_reviews.title: these are great sunglasses always loved Oakley
customer_reviews.text: these are great sunglasses always loved Oakley. only con is that the lens are much lighter then i was anticipating. they are mildy tinted i was expecting a darker tint but i love the frames so i will looking into maybe getting replacement lens a darker shade.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of sunglasses I have.
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I use my glasses for work, golfing and fishing. Best pair of sunglasses I have.
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Oakley the best
customer_reviews.text: Got the shades for my dad's birthday. He loves them. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Who Cares

customer_reviews.title: Awwwsome
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses ever had. The colors and quality are incredibly noticed as you put them on. I have tried lots of brands and polarized lenses and none is compared to this polarized quality. thx oakley fr beong the best.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Ledezma V

customer_reviews.title: Didn't love them at first but they are growing on me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't love them at first but they are growing on me. Lens are amazing, the frame could be a little more solid. Better price than my local Oakley store.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: I like the glasses but 2nd day wearing them and I guess the polarization is coming off :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great but the lenses are not mirrored.
customer_reviews.text: It's great but the lenses are not mirrored. So you can see the eyes. I was looking for something where you cannot see the eyes. The Shaun White gold series 24K is mirrored.
customer_reviews.author: ike_amazon

customer_reviews.title: Really like them but lens scratched too easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses, but dropped once and lens scratched. Bummer for a 130 dollar pair of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Not my type
customer_reviews.text: They are huge, and I'm a person with a relatively big face, I look like an old lady with them. Will sell them
customer_reviews.author: Marturus

customer_reviews.title: The best sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are very comfortable. And the clarity is amazing. Brings out the color of everything
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Neal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing glasses!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The last pair were worn daily for 3+ years and held up great. Totally worth the money to get a nice pair like these!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: In perfect condition when they arrived. Saved a lot money than purchasing from Lens Crafters
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Like the glasses but no case!
customer_reviews.text: I like the glasses but I didn’t get a case for them. I have 5 pairs of Oakley’s and you always get a case for 190$ I should have.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Like them, but the color isn't what you'll expect
customer_reviews.text: So, for those wanting the green iridium, just know that the lenses are not actually green. The picture is not correct at all for them. They look more like a mirrored yellow, like alligator eyes. Although, if you're standing above some green grass they'll look more green!
customer_reviews.author: Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, but received wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses, the prizm lenses are incredible. Would’ve gave 5 stars but I received the 57mm instead of 55mm.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DiVito

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, classic look!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fit! I have a medium sized face and these look and feel fantastic. This is my first pair of real oakleys and the quality compared to the Chinese knockoffs are night and day. Fit and finish on the frames are great and the lenses are really clear with no distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Bdmohawk

product_meta.title: Oakley Unisex-Adult Holbrook OO9102-C1 Polarized Iridium Square Sunglasses, Polished Black w/Prizm Deep Water Polarized, 57 mm
product_meta.description:
Oakley Holbrook sunglasses is a timeless, classic design fused with modern Oakley technology. Inspired by the screen heroes from the 1940s, 50s, and 60s, the Oakley Holbrook design epitomizes the spirit of exploration and adventure. The iconic American frame design is accented by metal rivets and Oakley icons, perfect for those who seek equal parts performance and style. Each pair of Holbrook sunglasses sport Oakley's famous Plutonite lenses that block 100% of all UVA, UVB, UVC and harmful blue light up to 400mm as well as a three-point fit system designed for comfort and everyday wear.

Oakley was created for world-class athletes, those who see the limits of possibility as just another challenge. Their dedication drives the brand to look beyond the conventional ideas of industry standards. It's in Oakley's DNA to identify problems, create inventions, and wrap those inventions in art. And simply to make things better than anyone thought possible. Decades of Oakley innovation have been awarded more than 540 patents that elevate physics to the level of art. Technologies transcend sports to enhance the lives of consumers, and more than 110 countries now enjoy a full array of market-leading products including premium sunglasses, goggles, prescription eyewear, apparel, footwear and accessories. These products represent Oakley's commitment to excellence - a passion that redefines what is possible for those who defy their own limits.
feature_bullets: Oakley Plutonite Lenses offer 100% UV Protection filtering of all UVA, UVB, UVC and harmful blue light up to 400mm. Oakley’s lightweight Plutonite lens material offers superior comfort, clarity & protection against impact and ultraviolet radiation.

PRIZM Lens Technology designed to enhance color, contrast and detail so athletes can make the most of any activity. Primz Deep H2O Polarized sport lenses designed to enhance color vividness in bright conditions on the water. Ideal for off shore fishing or boating. HD Polarized lenses that block 99% of reflected glare. Light transmission: 12%
Patented High Definition Optics (HDO) provides superior optical clarity and razor-sharp vision at every angle.

O Matter stress-resistant frame is lightweight & durable for all-day comfort & protection. Oakley’s injection molded thermoplastic O-Matter frame provides improved strength & flexibility over traditional acetate & is built to withstand shifting or deforming over time.
Three-Point Fit: Comfort and performance that holds lenses in precise optical alignment. Contact only happens at the bridge of the nose and behind the temples.

Multiple Frame and Lens Colors: Choose from multiple colors of frames—including black and matte brown tortoise—and lenses—including non-polarized and polarized Prizm options, to enhance color, contrast, and detail for an optimized experience.
Microbag included to clean and store your Oakley sunglasses.
Visit the Oakley brand shop to view the entire Oakley assortment by clicking on the Oakley logo above.
